org.jetel.sequence

Class SimpleSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.GraphElement
      • org.jetel.sequence.SimpleSequence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequence, IGraphElement

    public class SimpleSequence
extends GraphElement
implements Sequence
    Since:
    31.5.2005 Simple class implementing Sequence interface. It uses internally "long" datatype to store sequence's value. The value is persistent (stored on disk under specified name).
    The class caches specified number of sequence values so it protects uniqueness of generated values in various situations.
    Note: by setting number of cached values to high enough value (>20) the performance of SimpleSequence can be greatly increased. The XML DTD describing the internal structure is as follows: <!ATTLIST Sequence id ID #REQUIRED type NMTOKEN (SIMPLE_SEQUENCE) #REQUIRED name CDATA #REQUIRED fileURL CDATA #REQUIRED start CDATA #IMPLIED step CDATA #IMPLIED cached CDATA #IMPLIED>

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleSequence

        public SimpleSequence(java.lang.String id,
              TransformationGraph graph,
              java.lang.String sequenceName,
              java.lang.String filename,
              long start,
              int step,
              int numCachedValues)
        Creates SimpleSequence object.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier of sequence
        graph - transformation graph, where is sequence placed
        sequenceName - name (should be unique) of the sequence to be created
        filename - filename (with full path) under which store sequence value's
        start - the number the sequence should start with
        step - the step to use when generating sequences
        numCachedValues - how many values should be cached (reduces IO but consumes some of the available values between object reusals)

      • SimpleSequence

        public SimpleSequence(java.lang.String id,
              TransformationGraph graph,
              java.lang.String configFilename)
        Constructor for the SimpleSequence object.
        Parameters:
        configFilename - properties filename containing definition of sequence (properties file)

      • checkConfig

        public ConfigurationStatus checkConfig(ConfigurationStatus status)
        Description copied from interface: IGraphElement
        Checks the configuration of this graph element. This method should verify that all required parameters are set and that the element can be used. This method might be called before graph execution, in such case it will be called before the IGraphElement.init() method. It is not guaranteed that this method will ever be called, but also this method may be called repeatedly. All resources allocated in this method should be freed in this method too.
        Specified by:
        checkConfig in interface IGraphElement
        Overrides:
        checkConfig in class GraphElement

      • isShared

        public boolean isShared()
        Description copied from interface: Sequence
        Is this sequence shared via an authority (i.e. server). Returns true if the sequence doesn't have its lifetime bound to the graph instance.
        Specified by:
        isShared in interface Sequence
